plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 I am a healthy snack.
🌱 I am a small, leafy plant.
🥕 Bunnies like to munch on me, but I am not orange.

plant.question: I am tall and have a strong trunk. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I am made of wood.
🍁 I can have green leaves that change color in the fall.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb up me.

plant.question: I am colorful and smell sweet. Bees like to visit me to collect my nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 💐 I am often given as a gift.
🌷 I grow in gardens.
🐝 I help bees make honey.

plant.question: I grow on a vine and am green or purple. You can eat me as a snack or make juice from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 I come in bunches.
🥤 You can find me in a juice box.
🥪 I am often used to make jelly for your sandwich

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on a tree. Squirrels bury me in the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🌰 I am often brown.
🐿️ Squirrels like to collect me for the winter.
🪨 I am not a rock, but my shell can be hard like one

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground. I can be mashed, fried, or baked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥔 I am brown or red on the outside and white or yellow on the inside.
🍟 People often make fries out of me.
🌍 I come from under the ground.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a prickly outside. Inside, I'm sweet and yellow. What am I?

hints.text: 🍍 I have a crown on top.
🏝️ I grow in warm places.
🍕 Some people like me on pizza!

plant.question: I am a seed that pops when heated. You can eat me at the movies. What am I?

hints.text: 🍿 I am often buttery and salty.
🌽 I come from a plant with yellow kernels.
🎬 You can eat me while watching a movie.

plant.question: I am a tall, strong plant that gives us the wood for our houses and paper for our books. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 Animals make their home in me
🌳 I grow slowly and live for many years
✏️ Paper comes from me.

plant.question: I’m a plant with a long trunk and big leaves. Monkeys love my fruit. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 Monkeys love to eat my yellow fruit.
🌴 I grow in warm, tropical places.
🍌 I am long, curved, and yellow, and you peel me to eat me.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧I am made of water.
🚢 Boats float on me.
🌊 I have waves.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am very slow.
🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🏖️ You can find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
💦 I can squirt ink.
🖐️ I have many arms.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I swim very fast.
🚨 Be careful around me!
🦷 I have lots of pointy teeth.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small and pretty.
🧱 I live in a reef.
🌈 I have many colors.

ocean.question: I'm a mammal that swims and blows water out of my head. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am very big.
🌬️ I breathe air.
🌊 I live in the ocean, but I am not a fish.

ocean.question: I am a star that lives under the sea. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I have points.
🖐️ I have five arms.
✨ I am not in the sky.

ocean.question: I am a type of ray that can shock you. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I can give a zap!
🪢 I am flat and swim in the ocean.
🌊 Don't touch me!

ocean.question: I am a long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I wiggle through the water.
🌊 I am slippery.
🔦 Some of us can light up!

ocean.question: I am a very old and slow sea animal with a beak. What am I?

hints.text: 🦜 I have a pointy mouth.
🐢 I lay eggs on the beach.
👵 I can live for a very long time.
